definition[0]: the resonance of a sound is its quality of being deep and loud and continuing for a long time
definition[1]: the special meaning or importance that something has for you because it relates to your own experiences
example[0]: a tradition that has little resonance in the 21st century
example[1]: His words will have resonance for many musicians.
definition[2]: sound that is produced or increased in one object by sound waves from another object
